messages.subject: Re: "fundies"
messages.msgSnippet: lol!!!  Once I was in an abortion debate and someone called me a fundy.  I had never heard the term before and thought it sounded like some kind of kinky
messages.messageBody:
lol!!! Once I was in an abortion debate and someone called me a
fundy. I had never heard the term before and thought it sounded like
some kind of kinky underwear. I spent a lot of time going over my
posts, making sure I hadn't unintentionally said anything sexual. ;)

Sheila


> >That is GOOD - I'll enjoy the word "fundies" a lot more in the
future.
> >
> > <http://www.grownupfun.com/fundies-undies.html>
> >
> Yep.... that's them! LOL If I recall correctly, they changed the
photo
> on the box since 1987 because they used to be leopard print ones
with
> real people in them. Too funny!
>
> TreeGoddess

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "fundies"
messages.msgSnippet: ... That is GOOD - I ll enjoy the word fundies a lot more in the future.
messages.messageBody:
On Saturday, April 12, 2003, at 10:46 AM, treegoddess@... wrote:

> Fundies -- The
> Underwear for Two!".

That is GOOD - I'll enjoy the word "fundies" a lot more in the future.

<http://www.grownupfun.com/fundies-undies.html>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "fundies"

> Underwear for Two!".

Pam G.
